intro.p: Hello, my name is Leif Linder. I am a web developer from Seattle Washington but have lived all over the world. I studied Web Developing in New York and worked as on primarily PHP based web applications for many years.
Although coding is my current professional I have worked in the stock photography business as an image researcher and supplier of images.
My college education is in Media and writing for media and new writing. I am maninly professionally concerned with creating documents, whether that be as web code or images or news and journalism.

freetime.p: "Move through space and time" is something I say a lot. I really enjoy going places on my bike or bus or tram.
I like to take the train and I like to fly to different cities and learn their transit system.
In one form or another I am always traveling. I am not a person who wants to lie on the beach or lounge at a spa. I always have to have action and adventure, when I am not working.

goals.p: My goal is to develop my current ideas including a delivery app and a social media app for artists and musician. These are concrete goals although I also have less tangible goals.

I would like to work in a place where we do something I am proud of and proud to be a part of. I want to work where my ability to be creative and design systems is valued. It would be great to work with relaxed and friendly people and to have a fun mix of worktime and creative time.
